front.title: IPv6 Application of the Alternate Marking Method

abstract.t: This document describes how the Alternate Marking Method can be used as a passive performance measurement tool in an IPv6 domain. It defines an Extension Header Option to encode Alternate Marking information in both the Hop-by-Hop Options Header and Destination Options Header. According to RFC 8799, the IPv6 application of the Alternate Marking Method can be deployed in a controlled environment.
